abstract: NRG Energy said Wednesday it has turned down Exelon’s latest hostile takeover bid of $8 billion in stock because it undervalues the business.

lead_paragraph: Update | 10:16 a.m.  NRG Energy said Wednesday it had turned down Exelon‘s revised hostile takeover bid of $8 billion in stock because it undervalued the business.

headline.main: NRG Rejects Latest Bid from Exelon
